name: Runwago
description: Runwago: Monetize your goals! 100% Sustainable App, already available on the App Store and Google Play, supported by GARMIN! The SportFi Revolution is here! Meet Runwago: an App with a unique concept where runners completing their challenge are rewarded by users who failed, Runwago is bringing 100% sustainability to the 300 million active daily runners eager to monetize their running goals! Backed by institutional investors and sports brands, Runwago aims to start the SportFi revolution!
